title: 客户端崩溃
author: pepsi小唐
txt_content:

replies.author: もぺもぺ
replies.txt_content:
尝试删除 VexView_ForgeMod_1.12+.jar

或者检查它的配置

replies.author: 嘿嘿嘿嘿嘿鹰
replies.txt_content:
可能由三个MOD导致的崩溃
  CorePlugin ([平滑字体]SmoothFont-mc1.12.2-1.16.2.jar)
  CustomSkinLoader ([万用皮肤补丁]CustomSkinLoader_Forge-14.10a.jar)
